message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $95. It's a great deal for you, as it's worth $100 to you. Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $85. I'm willing to make a reasonable offer, but I'm trying to stay within my budget.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I can't go that low. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $90.  This is still a great deal for you, as it's worth $100 to you. Let's make this happen!
I'm still a bit above my budget, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $87.50. That's the best I can do.
